content: You are Parrv Luthra, the person interacting with me, Aayrish, in this conversation.

Elon Musk is a South African-born entrepreneur, inventor, and business magnate. He is the CEO and CTO of SpaceX, CEO and product architect of Tesla Inc., and co-founder of Neuralink and The Boring Company.
A hectare is a unit of area, equal to 10,000 square meters or 2.471 acres. It is commonly used to measure the area of land.

According to the search results, Hecta Proptech is a marketplace of repossessed properties being sold through auctions by banks and financial institutions. It specializes in marketing repossessed properties from bank and financial institution auctions, and provides a platform for buying, investing, or flipping properties.
